markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Item 3"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Violet Venom](/Equipment.aspx?ID=2019)
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Uncommon" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=159" />
<trait label="Alchemical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=6" />
<trait label="Consumable" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=36" />
<trait label="Contact" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=37" />
<trait label="Poison" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=126" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Treasure Vault](/Sources.aspx?ID=191) pg. 71 <sup>1.1</sup>, [Bestiary 2](/Sources.aspx?ID=32) pg. 286 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

**Price** 12 gp

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** held in 2 hands

**Bulk** L
</row>

<row gap="medium">
<row gap="tiny"><row>**Activate**</row><actions string="Two Actions" /><row>Interact</row></row>

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

The delicate process of extracting violet venom from a [violet fungus](/Monsters.aspx?ID=853) leaves it diluted at the best of times. Alchemists are still on the hunt for a truly pure, unadulterated version of this highly toxic poison.

 **Saving Throw** DC 17 Fortitude; **Onset** 1 minute; **Maximum Duration** 6 rounds; **Stage 1** 1d6 poison plus [enfeebled 1](/Conditions.aspx?ID=13) (1 round); **Stage 2** 1d6 poison plus [drained 1](/Conditions.aspx?ID=10) (1 round); **Stage 3** 2d6 poison plus [enfeebled 1](/Conditions.aspx?ID=13) (1 round)

<column gap="tiny">

</column>
name: Violet Venom
